title: Cabbage, rice and bacon
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '450g (1lb) bacon, diced', '2 large onions, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon chicken seasoning', 'black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tins tomatoes', '500g easycook long grain rice', 'hot water as needed', '1 whole savoy cabage, shredded']
